b'Nitaboh': b'At a young age, Nitaroh is stricken with an illness that leaves him blind. He inherits the shamisen once used by his mother and is taught its basics by a blind traveling shamisen player. In time, with the help of friends old and new, he walks the paths that leads to his ultimate fate\xe2\x80\x94that of founder of the Tsugaru style of shamisen playing.\n\n(Source: ANN)'
